item.title: `curl`'ing a Tailscale Webhook
item.description: [Tailscale] is really good. I’ve been using it as a virtual private network to span 2 home networks and to securely (!) access my hosts when I’m remote. Recently Tailscale added Webhook functionality to permit processing subscribed-to (Tailscale) events. I’m always a sucker for a webhook ;-) Here’s a curl command to send a test event to a Tailscale Webhook: URL="" # From Tailscale's docs # https://tailscale.com/kb/1213/webhooks/#events-payload BODY=' [ { "timestamp": "2022-09-21T13:37:51.
